summary: Completed comprehensive testing of F1 Fast Lap Challenge Multi-Event System. All 10 requested features tested and working correctly. Backend: 35 tests passed (17 multi-event + 18 existing). Frontend: All UI flows verified via Playwright.

issues: Only shows 'Geplante Events' section header - other status sections (Live, Beendet, Archiviert) only appear when events exist in those statuses

passed_tests: Übersichtsseite (/) zeigt alle Events gruppiert nach Status - PASS
Top 3 Vorschau kann ausgeklappt werden - PASS (shows Max Verstappen, Lewis Hamilton, Charles Leclerc with times)
Event-Detailseite (/event/{slug}) zeigt Rangliste - PASS (shows full leaderboard with ranks, gaps)
Admin Dashboard zeigt alle Events mit Verwaltungsoptionen - PASS (Verwalten, QR, Copy, Status dropdown, Delete)
Event erstellen funktioniert - PASS (creates event with slug, scheduled status)
Rundenzeit zu Event hinzufügen funktioniert - PASS (added Test Driver T1 with 1:25.789)
Event Status ändern (Geplant → Live → Beendet → Archiviert) - PASS (dropdown with all options)
QR-Code generieren funktioniert - PASS (generates PNG image with URL kopieren/Speichern buttons)
CSV Export funktioniert - PASS (exports with Platz, Fahrer, Team, Rundenzeit, Abstand, E-Mail columns)
Bild-Upload zeigt Toast-Feedback - PASS (Strecken dialog has upload button with toast messages)
seed_data_creation: Test data created and cleaned up during testing. Existing test events: test-event-live (4 entries), monaco-gp-2026, silverstone-gp-2026
context_for_next_testing_agent: Multi-Event System fully tested. Key endpoints: GET /api/events (grouped by status), GET /api/events/{slug} (detail with entries), POST /api/admin/events (create), PUT /api/admin/events/{id} (update status), DELETE /api/admin/events/{id}, POST /api/admin/events/{id}/laps (add entry - response wraps in 'entry' field), GET /api/events/{slug}/qr (QR code PNG), GET /api/admin/events/{id}/export/csv. Frontend components: EventsOverview (grouped cards with Top 3 preview), EventPage (full leaderboard), AdminDashboard (event management with dialogs).

overview_page_grouped_events.details: Shows 'Geplante Events' section with event cards, status badges, participant counts, dates

top_3_preview_expandable.details: Clicking 'Top 3 Vorschau' expands to show top 3 drivers with rank badges and lap times

event_detail_page.details: /event/{slug} shows full leaderboard with ranks (1,2,3 colored), driver names, teams, lap times, gaps

admin_dashboard_events.details: Shows all events with Verwalten, QR, Copy URL, Status dropdown, Delete buttons

event_creation.details: Dialog with Event Name, Strecke dropdown, Datum, Uhrzeit fields. Creates with auto-generated slug

add_lap_time.details: Event detail dialog has Zeiten tab with Fahrername, Team, Zeit inputs. Shows toast 'Rundenzeit hinzugefügt!'

event_status_change.details: Dropdown shows Geplant, Live, Beendet, Archiviert options. Status updates immediately

qr_code_generation.details: Dialog shows QR code image with 'URL kopieren' and 'Speichern' buttons

csv_export.details: Exports CSV with headers: Platz, Fahrer, Team, Rundenzeit, Abstand, E-Mail

image_upload_toast.details: Strecken dialog has 'Streckenbild' section with URL input and upload button. Toast messages for success/error
